name: MeaslesTestsForMeaslesVirusNucleicAcid
title: Measles (Tests for measles virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Measles nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Measles nucleic acid;  

LOINC search:  'Measles virus nucleic acid -rubella -panel'),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests)
